title: Meatball curry
description: Give meatballs the Indian treatment in this easy curry recipe. Serve with plenty of veggies for a healthy dinner.Each serving provides 220kcal, 29g protein, 8g carbohydrate (of which 6g sugars), 8g fat (of which 3g saturates), 1.9g fibre and 0.3g salt.
ingredients: ½ tsp black pepper, coarsely ground
cooked brown basmati rice, to serve
